vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.28
§ Zabbai = "pure"
1) a descendant of Bebai who took a foreign wife in the days of Ezra
2) father of Baruch, who assisted Nehemiah in rebuilding the city wall
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Bebai; en tiempos de Esdras
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
薩拜 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "單純"
1)比拜的後裔，在以斯拉時期取了外邦女子 (拉10:28)
2)巴錄的父親, 協助尼希米重建耶路撒冷圍牆 (尼3:20)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
萨拜 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "单纯"
1)比拜的后裔，在以斯拉时期取了外邦女子 (拉10:28)
2)巴录的父亲, 协助尼希米重建耶路撒冷围墙 (尼3:20)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.20;
father of: Baruch (H1263)
§ Zabbai = "pure"
1) a descendant of Bebai who took a foreign wife in the days of Ezra
2) father of Baruch, who assisted Nehemiah in rebuilding the city wall
